key_risk_themes: ["Complexity of Secure User-Generated Content Execution","DevOps and Infrastructure as a Critical Path Dependency","Robustness of Offline-First and Data Synchronization Logic"]
immediate_actions_required: ["Allocate dedicated DevOps resources to begin work on the 'Minimum Viable Pipeline' and core Terraform infrastructure immediately.","Conduct a formal security design review for the Cognito PKCE flow and the `isolated-vm` sandbox implementation before coding begins.","Develop a detailed E2E test plan for the offline synchronization feature, including specific conflict scenarios to simulate."]
